title: Why is Jason Thompson allowed to put very large campaign signage that exceeds the city code, at busy intersections and all over Wilmington; when other candidates are required to abide by the code?
text:
During an election cycle, MyReporter.com will pass questions about
the

candidates on to the StarNews reporters covering the races. The

answers may appear as part of our campaign coverage, which you can

follow at StarNewsOnline.com/Elections.
